XIsf_BufferWriteParam Struct Reference

#include <xilisf.h>


Data Fields

u8 BufferNum
u8 * WritePtr
u32 ByteOffset
u32 NumBytes

Detailed Description

The following structure definition specifies the operational parameters to be passed to the XIsf_Write API while writing data to the internal SRAM buffer of the Atmel Serial Flash (XISF_BUFFER_WRITE).

Field Documentation

u8 XIsf_BufferWriteParam::BufferNum
 

SRAM buffer number of Serial Flash

u32 XIsf_BufferWriteParam::ByteOffset
 

Byte offset in the buffer from which the data is written

u32 XIsf_BufferWriteParam::NumBytes
 

Number of bytes to be written into the buffer

u8* XIsf_BufferWriteParam::WritePtr
 

Pointer to the data to be written into the Serial Flash SRAM Buffer
